title: What can I do if my phone can't install a third-party application?
answer:
l   Your phone supports third-party applications in APK format only. Make sure the application you are trying to download is in this format.

l   If the application is not from Google's **Play Store**, go to the **Settings** screen, touch **Security**, select the **Unknown sources** check box, and touch **OK**.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205618261001.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205619349002.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205619604003.jpg) 

l   The third-party application may not be compatible with your phone.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205619540004.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
